__e: Is this the belle of the Hudson River Valley?
We have a passenger airliner in the north fiver. We're en route. We will advise.
What about the guy who landed the plane in the Hudson?
I went to a party this weekend, at H.U., and I was drunk-- I should never drink.
- Now Billy, I'd be obliged if you'd take this young lady down to Mrs. Hudson and give her a cup of tea.
- How d'you mean? - Lucky for you, Mrs Hudson and I watch far too much telly.
